workflow:
cwlVersion: v1.0
steps:
  '1':
    run: read-potential-cases-omop.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule1
  '2':
    run: imported-codelist-terma---secondary.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule2
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 1/output
  '3':
    run: imported-codelist---secondary.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule3
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 2/output
  '4':
    run: imported-codelist-termf---primary.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule4
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 3/output
  '5':
    run: imported-codelist---primary.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule5
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 4/output
  '6':
    run: imported-codelist-terml---primary.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule6
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 5/output
  '7':
    run: imported-codelist-termn---primary.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule7
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 6/output
  '8':
    run: output-cases.cwl
    out:
    - output
    in:
      inputModule:
        id: inputModule
        source: inputModule8
      potentialCases:
        id: potentialCases
        source: 7/output
class: Workflow
inputs:
  inputModule1:
    id: inputModule1
    doc: Js implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule2:
    id: inputModule2
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule3:
    id: inputModule3
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule4:
    id: inputModule4
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule5:
    id: inputModule5
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule6:
    id: inputModule6
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule7:
    id: inputModule7
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
  inputModule8:
    id: inputModule8
    doc: Python implementation unit
    type: File
outputs:
  cases:
    id: cases
    type: File
    outputSource: 8/output
    outputBinding:
      glob: '*.csv'
requirements:
  SubworkflowFeatureRequirement: {}

steps.name: read-potential-cases-omop
steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: node
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Read potential cases from an OMOP db.
id: read-potential-cases-omop
inputs:
- doc: Node implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Initial potential cases, read from an OMOP DB.
  id: output
  outputBinding:
    glob: '*.csv'
  type: File
requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/node:latest
s:type: external

steps.name: imported-codelist-terma---secondary
steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: python
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Identify Imported codelist terma - secondary
id: imported-codelist-terma---secondary
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
- doc: Potential cases of Imported-codelist
  id: potentialCases
  inputBinding:
    position: 2
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Patients with clinical codes indicating Imported-codelist related events in
    electronic health record.
  id: output
  outputBinding:
    glob: '*.csv'
  type: File
requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/python:latest
s:type: logic

steps.name: imported-codelist---secondary
steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: python
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Identify Imported codelist - secondary
id: imported-codelist---secondary
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
- doc: Potential cases of Imported-codelist
  id: potentialCases
  inputBinding:
    position: 2
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Patients with clinical codes indicating Imported-codelist related events in
    electronic health record.
  id: output
  outputBinding:
    glob: '*.csv'
  type: File
requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/python:latest
s:type: logic

steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/

cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Identify Imported codelist termf - primary
id: imported-codelist-termf---primary
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
- doc: Potential cases of Imported-codelist
  id: potentialCases
  inputBinding:
    position: 2
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Patients with clinical codes indicating Imported-codelist related events in
    electronic health record.
  id: output
  outputBinding:
    glob: '*.csv'
  type: File
requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/python:latest

steps.name: imported-codelist---primary
steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: python
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Identify Imported codelist - primary
id: imported-codelist---primary
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
- doc: Potential cases of Imported-codelist
  id: potentialCases
  inputBinding:
    position: 2
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Patients with clinical codes indicating Imported-codelist related events in
    electronic health record.
  id: output

requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/python:latest
s:type: logic

steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: python
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Identify Imported codelist terml - primary
id: imported-codelist-terml---primary
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1

steps.name: imported-codelist-termn---primary
steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: python
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Identify Imported codelist termn - primary
id: imported-codelist-termn---primary
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
- doc: Potential cases of Imported-codelist
  id: potentialCases
  inputBinding:
    position: 2
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Patients with clinical codes indicating Imported-codelist related events in
    electronic health record.
  id: output
  outputBinding:
    glob: '*.csv'
  type: File
requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/python:latest
s:type: logic

steps.name: output-cases
steps.content:
$namespaces:
  s: http://phenomics.kcl.ac.uk/phenoflow/
baseCommand: python
class: CommandLineTool
cwlVersion: v1.0
doc: Output cases
id: output-cases
inputs:
- doc: Python implementation unit
  id: inputModule
  inputBinding:
    position: 1
  type: File
- doc: Potential cases of Imported-codelist
  id: potentialCases
  inputBinding:
    position: 2
  type: File
outputs:
- doc: Output containing patients flagged as having this type of Imported-codelist
  id: output
  outputBinding:
    glob: '*.csv'
  type: File
requirements:
  DockerRequirement:
    dockerPull: kclhi/python:latest
s:type: output

workflowInputs:
inputModule1:
  class: File
  path: js/read-potential-cases-omop.js
inputModule2:
  class: File
  path: python/imported-codelist-terma---secondary.py
inputModule3:
  class: File
  path: python/imported-codelist---secondary.py
inputModule4:
  class: File
  path: python/imported-codelist-termf---primary.py
inputModule5:
  class: File
  path: python/imported-codelist---primary.py
inputModule6:
  class: File
  path: python/imported-codelist-terml---primary.py
inputModule7:
  class: File
  path: python/imported-codelist-termn---primary.py
inputModule8:
  class: File
  path: python/output-cases.py
